lead_paragraph: Six-times Olympic cycling gold medalist Chris Hoy is gearing up for his biggest thrill on four wheels after announcing on Thursday his entry with Nissan in this year's Le Mans 24 Hours sportscar race.

headline.print_headline: Motor Racing: Olympic Cycling Champion Hoy to Enter Le Mans
headline.main: Motor Racing: Olympic Cycling Champion Hoy to Enter Le Mans

snippet: Six-times Olympic cycling gold medalist Chris Hoy is gearing up for his biggest thrill on four wheels after announcing on Thursday his entry with Nissan in this year's Le Mans 24 Hours sportscar race....
